What waste we DO NOT collect – FAQ

Published: July 26, 2025

It matters what you toss in the bag! Johnny The Bag hauls a lot – but some materials are off-limits.

What we DO NOT take:

  • Liquid hazardous waste (e.g. paint, oil, chemicals)
  • Electronic waste (TV, monitor, fridge, microwave)
  • Tires, batteries
  • Medical waste, toilet contents, animal carcasses
  • Asbestos or other dangerous construction materials

What we’re happy to collect:

  • Construction debris (concrete, bricks, tiles)
  • Junk waste (furniture, wood, plastic)
  • Green waste, soil, branches, cut grass

Dzsoni tells it straight:

“Don’t toss anything in the bag you wouldn’t bring into your living room.” – Johnny The Bag

Not sure? Call us! Better to ask than repack.

📞 Ask now!
